name: Airline Passenger Satisfaction
data_intro: This dataset contains an airline passenger satisfaction survey. What factors are highly correlated to a satisfied (or dissatisfied) passenger? Can you predict passenger satisfaction?

cat_feature_intro.Customer Type: *Customer Type:* The customer type (Loyal customer, disloyal customer)
cat_feature_intro.Type of Travel: *Type of Travel:* Purpose of the flight of the passengers (Personal Travel, Business Travel)
cat_feature_intro.Class: * Note that this data set was modified from this dataset by John D [here](https://www.kaggle.com/johndddddd/customer-satisfaction). It has been cleaned up for the purposes of classification.
cat_feature_intro.satisfaction: * Note that this data set was modified from this dataset by John D [here](https://www.kaggle.com/johndddddd/customer-satisfaction). It has been cleaned up for the purposes of classification.

num_feature_intro.Age: *Baggage handling:* Satisfaction level of baggage handling
num_feature_intro.Flight Distance: *Flight distance:* The flight distance of this journey
num_feature_intro.Inflight wifi service: *Inflight wifi service:* Satisfaction level of the inflight wifi service (0:Not Applicable;1-5)
num_feature_intro.Departure/Arrival time convenient: *Departure/Arrival time convenient:* Satisfaction level of Departure/Arrival time convenient
num_feature_intro.Ease of Online booking: *Ease of Online booking:* Satisfaction level of online booking
num_feature_intro.Gate location: *Gate location:* Satisfaction level of Gate location
num_feature_intro.Food and drink: *Food and drink:* Satisfaction level of Food and drink
num_feature_intro.Online boarding: *Online boarding:* Satisfaction level of online boarding
num_feature_intro.Seat comfort: *Seat comfort:* Satisfaction level of Seat comfort
num_feature_intro.Inflight entertainment: *Inflight entertainment:* Satisfaction level of inflight entertainment
num_feature_intro.On-board service: *On-board service:* Satisfaction level of On-board service
num_feature_intro.Leg room service: *Leg room service:* Satisfaction level of Leg room service
num_feature_intro.Baggage handling: *Baggage handling:* Satisfaction level of baggage handling
num_feature_intro.Inflight service: *Inflight service:* Satisfaction level of inflight service
num_feature_intro.Departure Delay in Minutes: *Departure Delay in Minutes:* Minutes delayed when departure
num_feature_intro.Arrival Delay in Minutes: *Arrival Delay in Minutes:* Minutes delayed when Arrival
